Address: 27-29 Sea Haven Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Neat As A Pin
Nestled amidst the peninsula townships of Clifton Springs & Drysdale this neat as a pin family home is perfection in any ones eyes.
Set on a generous corner block of 623m2 in one of the quietest streets in the area and consisting of four bedrooms, main with full ensuite, you will have all the space in the world for the family or if youre in retirement, have the gran kids stay over and they wont be under your feet. Two living areas create just that bit more comfort.
The kitchen and dining areas are bright and functional with light floor tiles and contrasting dark benchtops, the dining area is complimented with a gorgeous bay window looking out to the north facing rear yard, the main living area is bathed in sunlight via the large windows, and the rear yard has enough space for the kids to play but is simple in presentation and low in maintenance.
The home is warm and inviting, superbly designed, and easily maintained. The double garage is entered from the Eastern end of the property whilst at the Western end there is side access to allow the boat and van to be stored behind secure gates.
Located near primary and secondary schools, central to Bellarines burgeoning wineries and cafés, a stones throw from beaches and fishing spots and shopping just around the corner, you would struggle to get anywhere better.
If you have considered the change to the Bellarine or you are looking to upsize, downsize, resize or just put the feet up, your search for the perfect peninsula home starts and finishes here.

Description:
Family living without breaking the bank
Delightful open entryway leading to the spacious separate lounge & the first of four bedrooms. You can feel the warmth of the early afternoon sun as you relax in the living room.
Adding to that feeling of privacy with gorgeous garden views just outside the front window,.
Alcove dining room separate to the kitchen, with easy access between the two rooms.
Original kitchen features breakfast bar & informal casual dining/lounge offering a second family space.
Master bedroom with its own ensuite bathroom has a wonderful outlook of the backyard. The other three bedrooms, all with built in robes, make use of a central bathroom.
An expansive double carport means the family car is protected from the elements.
At approximately 644 sqm, the expansive parcel of land provides plenty of room with a garden shed for tools & a rustic cubby in the backyard.
With this much room, the possibilities are endless, whether that's outdoor entertaining, more shedding or anything in between the choice is yours.
Easy access to the boat ramp, Clifton Springs Bowls Club & golf course.

Description:
Waterway Estate - 7 Waterway Court, now titled!
Titled land for sale!
Beautiful 1,020 sqm parcel of land with a 18 metre frontage.
Rarely does an inspirational development come to light in the heart of Drysdale Township providing a diversity of allotment
sizes. Waterway Estate is centrally located, only a 5 minute walk to Drysdale's town centre providing a range of convenience
retailers, health facilities, primary and secondary schools. Unique opportunity to purchase land of this size within close proximity to key amenities with Geelong CBD just 20 minutes away.
Please enquiry to receive a comprehensive email package of engineering, finished surfaces.

Description:
QUALITY FAMILY HOME IN THRIVING LEOPOLD
This quality 6yr old Porter Davis 4 bed plus study, 2 bathroom, 2 living home would suit a growing family, savvy investor with a potential rent of $440 pw or a downsizing couple with nothing to do but move in and enjoy.
Set on a spacious 450m2 block, this fabulous floor plan flows beautifully.
Comprising of Spacious parents Master suite located at the front of the home, equipped with double dressed blinds, and split system AC for all year round comfort. There is a spacious WIR and bright ensuite with modern shower, toilet and vanity storage.
Following the wide entry down the hall to find a further 2 bedrooms all with BIR and ceilings fan a neutral central bathroom, equipped with corner shower, separate bath and separate toilet. Down the hall on the left you will find a roomy front formal living/theatre room and the spacious fourth bedroom, also with BIR and ceiling fan.
Towards the rear of the home is the spacious open plan living/dining/kitchen area. This ideal space is where the whole family can come together. The kitchen is equipped with Caesar stone benchtops, 900ml 5 burner gas cooker, oven dishwasher and a huge butlers walk in pantry room.
In addition there is a handy study room, with glass sliding doors and custom built in desk for all your storage or home office needs.
The dining space can easily seat 8+ and is situated beautifully between the kitchen and bi fold stacker doors which open up to a pitched pergola and outdoor entertaining deck. Plus the rear grassed yard ideal for children or your four legged friend.
This quality home is ideally located in popular Estuary estate, 2km to Leopold shopping complex and Bunnings, 10 minutes to the coast and 10 mins to Geelong CBD.
FEATURES
NBN equipped
Brivis Gas Ducted Heating
2 x Mitsubishi Split system AC
Rent pw $440
Porter Davis Build

Description:
Contemporary Low Maintenance Living
Cute, quaint and contemporary, this Long Island Home build is positioned perfectly within the ever-popular boutique Central Walk Estate. Neat as a pin and immaculately presented, there is nothing left to do but simply move in and enjoy the lifestyle on offer.
The charm is felt imminently upon entry, with inviting timber floating floors and a clean crisp neutral palette. Bedrooms 1 and 2 sit at the fore of the home from the central hallway, are spacious in size and both comprise built-in-robes. The master retreat sits centrally and hosts a walk-in-robe and fully equipped ensuite with toilet, vanity and shower. A truly unique aspect from the master is also on offer, with sliding door access to a private and sun-filled courtyard -The most perfect place to enjoy that morning cup of tea! The lavish central bathroom offers stone benchtop vanity, tiled in bath, shower, a separate toilet and nifty laundry with storage and outdoor side access completes this wing of the home. The designer kitchen offers 40mm stone benchtops, 900ml gas cooking, stainless steel dishwasher, walk-in-pantry and an abundance of storage, all while overlooking the open plan dining and living area. Sliding door access from the dining welcomes you to a neat undercover area, which wraps around to an open grassed space. Complete with a SLUG with internal and external access and situated upon a nifty 306m2 block, low maintenance living has never looked so good!
Conveniently located with supermarkets, shops, public transport and schools only a short stroll away and with Golf Courses, the Bay, boat ramp, wineries, eateries and beaches and all that The Bellarine has to offer at your fingertips! The perfect opportunity to secure a unique home in a highly sought after location.

Description:
NOTHING BEATS THIS TOWNHOUSE FOR STYLE
Located within walking distance to the local shopping centre, the beautiful Drysdale recreation reserve and Mc Leods Waterholes.
Behind this entry door is style and craftmanship you will find only in a builders home. One with the lot - security alarm, ducted vacuum system, evaporative cooling and gas central heating. Spacious rooms, ample storage throughout and quality fixtures and fittings. The formal entry leads to the open plan living area which is warm and inviting with timber floating floors and large north facing windows. A kitchen with modern timber cabinetry in abundance, quality appliances and classy tiling and bench tops.
The master bedroom is spacious with its own ensuite and WIR. The second bedroom has wall to wall BIRs. Spacious second bathroom with double vanity.
Outside the low maintenance gardens are immaculately presented and fenced for privacy. The sheltered outdoor area is a sun trap on those warmer spring days and has access to the single garage. Be quick to inspect this special property.

Description:
Country Living, On The Coast
Auction Saturday 21st September at 12pm
The Feel:
Surrounded by rolling paddocks and peaceful bushland this 3.5 Acre lifestyle property is conveniently positioned an easy 5min drive to Ocean Grove beaches, and 20mins to Geelong CBD. This humble four bedroom home has had a successful family business operated on site.
The Facts:
-3.5 Acres lifestyle property in tightly held rural pocket
-Design your dream coastal home, in a quiet rural setting (STCA)
-Stunning rural vistas with street views of Barwon Heads Bluff
-4BR residence inc. dual living zones, and updated kitchen
-Reverse cycle AC, wood fireplace and solar array
-2nd level master suite or guest space with ensuite and robes
-Orchard with espalier fruit trees, raised vegie gardens and greenhouse
-Long country driveway with oversized DLUG and workshop facilities
-9x12m Clearspan shed with high clearance drive through access and power
-30,000L rainwater harvesting with connection points across the block
-Specialised boarding enclosures, dog run and sundry shedding
-17x22m fenced garden to rear, ideal for garden or hobby farm enclosure
-Ancient Norfolk Pine and stand of Yellow Gums attract local birdlife
-5mins to Ocean Grove and surf beaches, easy access to Geelong CBD
The Owner Loves…
“It’s so peaceful and feels very secluded here. We love the returning birdlife that visit us every year, and the protected nature reserves in this area. Access to town and the beach is quick, so it’s very well connected.”

Description:
Quiet, Private and Plenty of Space
Situated on a generous 647sqm block of landscaped gardens, this impeccably presented 3 bedroom home is in a great, family friendly street. Tucked behind mature trees and a charming picket fence, the north facing property is an ideal first home or investment with the potential to enhance or personalise to taste.
A winding paved path leads you to the front door which is flanked by the wrap around verandah. This will be the perfect spot for the morning coffee, sheltered and sunny. Inside, the exposed beams and pine lining boards give the house a warm and rustic feel. The light filled living/dining area is central to the home complete with wood heater, split system and ceiling fans. This leads out to a paved alfresco area set in the picturesque garden.
You will enjoy the spacious master bedroom with its wonderful views of the garden, large ensuite and generous walk in robe. Certainly, scope for a parents retreat with its size and sunny disposition. The home provides plenty of storage and 2 good sized bedrooms have easy access to the main bathroom.
The single lock up garage has internal entry for privacy and security and a large, sturdy workbench will appeal to many. Other features of the property include double gates for easy access for a boat, caravan and trailer whilst shops, schools, medical facilities and public transport are all within walking distance. Whether you are beginning your property journey or your retirement adventures, this is the ideal home to take that next step.
- Large corner allotment
- Impeccably presented 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home
- North facing open plan living/dining
- Attractive established landscaped garden
- Spacious master bedroom with ensuite and WIR
- Single lock up garage with workshop bench

Description:
Low Maintenance Living in Ideal Locale
This large stand-alone unit needs to be inspected to appreciate what is on offer. Located in a quiet and well-established pocket of Leopold, within walking distance to public transport, Leopold Sportsmans Club, the local convenience store and just a short drive to Leopolds Gateway Plaza.
Upon entering the unit, you are greeted with the expansive living room featuring a gas wall heater. Flowing through to the generous sized kitchen and dining zone, offering plenty of cupboard space, gas cooking, and room for the fridge.
The main bedroom includes a walk-in robe and direct access to the two-way central bathroom. The bathroom has a shower and full-sized bath, with a separate toilet. Further storage options are available in the hallway which leads to the second bedroom with built in robes.
Completing the floorplan is a good sized internal laundry with plenty of room for all the appliances. Outside offers a spacious and secure rear yard that wraps around the unit, single remote-controlled garage and further space for at least one other vehicle in the driveway.
This unit is the ideal property for either the first home buyer, downsizer or investor alike. With everything at your fingertips, this is one not to be missed.

Description:
Compelling Style and Lifestyle.
Promising lifestyle convenience in a walk-to-everywhere location, 17 Macauley Way will not disappoint those looking to discover and enjoy all that Drysdale and the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer.
This stunning home delivers outstanding, zoned living and entertaining spaces for families to enjoy and share with small or large groups of friends and loved ones.
Set privately within a lush garden setting, the stunning home offers a light filled, flowing floor-plan that presents perfect order throughout the home. You are greeted with a generous formal lounge & dining room leading to an expansive open plan family/meals area with a well appointed kitchen. Complemented with 4 bedrooms, with the Master bedroom having walk in robes & ensuite and the other 3 bedrooms having built in robes. The home has recently had new carpets, new bilnds and a fresh coat of paint throughout.
This superbly presented family home is located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, a short stroll to public transport, excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private & access to the Bellarine Peninsulas world class restaurants & wineries - all of which enhances the lifestyle appeal of this prestigious location. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.

Description:
Immaculate Family Home.
Looking for a lovely family home that you can move straight in with nothing to do? With only minutes from the Gateway Shopping Centre, local primary school, public transport and 10 minutes from Geelong CBD & Bellarine Peninsula, this low maintenance property could be the one you have been searching for! The property comprises of 3 bedrooms, 2 with built in robes, master with walk in robe and ensuite. All bedrooms have ceiling fans. Open plan kitchen, dining, living room with electric oven, gas cooktop, rangehood and split system. There is ample bench and cupboard space for those that love to bake. Outdoor entertainment area off the kitchens sliding door to entertain with family and friends. Central family bathroom with separate bath, shower & toilet. Bedrooms 2 and 3 are situated at the rear of the house. Storage shed and a double remote-controlled garage with internal access to the house. Add to this side access to the right of the property for trailer, caravan or boat storage, Ducted heating, Split system air conditioning. All situated in an approximate land size of 660m2. A must Inspection.

Address: 104 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
691m2 Corner Block
Treasured family home with 3 bedrooms or even a 4th bedroom, home office or study! The front door opens & you step inside to the lounge with bay windows & views of the You Yangs & bay plus reverse cycle split system with wood heater. Around the corner is a formal dining with yard views & sliding door to the kitchen. Kitchen has electric stove, range hood & double pantry. Also, another living area perfect for a second dining or family room with ceiling fan, sky light, electric heater & sliding doors to access the pergola. Down the hall is the 1st spacious bedroom with built in robes. Off to the side is the laundry. Further down is the central bathroom with separate shower & bath. Next is the master bedroom also has built in robes plus a full en-suite. Then follows a smaller living perfect for a parents retreat or kids playroom. Stepping down into the 3rd bedroom which is super-sized. The home office or study is off the double carport so clients can walk straight in. Outside you have 2 garden sheds plus a storage shed ideal for a workshop or man cave. Long yard with an undercover pergola entertaining area & landscaped garden. A bonus here is the double side gates perfect for the boat, caravan or trailer with its own driveway. Low maintenance front gardens on a 691m2 generous corner block.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property

Description:
Attention First Home Buyers And Investors!
The Feel:
Situated in a peaceful enclave surrounded by established properties, this updated 3BR home presents as an excellent entry point into a growing coastal market, opportunity for the discerning investor; or a relaxing bayside weekender with plenty of space for the boat and visitors! Neat as a pin and boasting easy care, low maintenance attributes, you’ll be hard pressed to find a better buy in this convenient central location.
The Facts:
- Neat and spacious, with two well defined living zones
- Modernised entertainers kitchen with ample storage
- Undercover outdoor patio, perfect for entertaining
- 3 brightly lit, roomy bedrooms, all with BIRs
- Master suite enjoys direct access to wet areas
- Updated central bathroom with separate W.C
- Utility room offering versatility as a home office
- Freestanding wood heater for optimal winter comfort
- Outstanding accommodation for 4 vehicles
- High set carport for caravans, boats and trailers
- Located close to Pinaroo Shopping Stripe for convenience
- Walking distance to the Dell, Springs Golf Club & Primary School
- Peaceful location, surrounded by established homes
The Owner Loves:
“We have loved the central location giving us the convenience of being able to walk everywhere. It’s a nice quiet area, with little disruption through the busy summer months. The home itself is low maintenance and very easy to live in.”

Description:
MORE THAN MEETS THE EYE
Behind the fence is more than just bricks and mortar. Only a block away from the local Primary School, Play grounds, Tennis courts, bus stop and shops, has this property sitting in a great position. If you are planning on moving in after the current lease end, which is October 2019, you will have an added advantage of being close to walking tracks, transport, the boat ramp and an approximate 15 minute drive to the Portarlington Ferry, which opens up Melbourne as an easy commute. Comprising 4 bedrooms, built in robes, full en-suite, formal "L" shaped lounge and a large dining area adjoining the well appointed kitchen. Outside offers a great under cover area, fenced yard, a double garage and an additional secure parking spot for the boat or trailer.

Description:
GRAND AND ELEGANT FAMILY ABODE
Situated in the heart of Drysdale, this superb family home has been built with pride and sits gracefully on approx. 1273m2 parcel of land overlooking lush green fields. This extensive home features multiple living spaces on a grand scale including a unique central atrium courtyard, a delightful formal lounge with ornamental fireplace, open plan kitchen, meals, family room and a parents retreat upstairs with balcony. French doors are featured throughout the home leading onto multiple balconies, with the main outdoor entertaining area flowing out from the open plan living room and kitchen. The upstairs Master bedroom is spacious and features WIR and full size ensuite and enjoys access to the upstairs living area and central atrium, giving natural light through the home. 3 further bedrooms with BIR's and home office contribute to the size and elegance of this home. An enormous 6 car garage underneath the home has to be seen to be appreciated and can easily accommodate multiple cars, a large boat and a full sized caravan.

Description:
1960s Charmer with Great Potential
Positioned on approximately 670m2 of land over the road from the Ash Road Shops this location is perfect for a home office or further development (STCA). A family room addition has extended this home to provide two very comfortable living areas; the front lounge looks out to the street and has the original brick hearth with timber mantel. The kitchen is neat and tidy and classical in design with an adjoining meals area. A servery opens onto the family room and allows the cook to keep an eye on the household while an external sliding door provides easy access to the backyard. The three bedrooms all have built in robes, the two end bedrooms are very generous in size and either could be used as the main bedroom. There are timber floorboards under the carpet in the original home just waiting for someone to expose them and bring them back to new. Ducted gas heating, an air conditioner and the opportunity to use the old fire place for more heating will please everyone. The single garage is perfect for storage or could be removed to provide vehicle entry to the expansive back yard. See the potential and reap the rewards of a little imagination.
*Every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the information contained herein, but no warranty is given and prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations.

Current Bid $770,000 - 8 Qualified Bidders

Contact Ross 0457 888 113 or Wayne 0418 521 221 immediately to become qualified and avoid disappointment.
Set on a sizeable allotment of approximately 1.35ha (3.35 acres). Comprising 5 generous bedrooms, 3 living zones and rural views from every window. With 6 car garage/workshop/carport and just minutes from Gateway Plaza and Geelong CBD.
5 generous bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe
Quality built home with wide hallway and open plan living
Further family room and lounge with rural outlooks
Double lock up garage with internal access and remote door
High spec. kitchen with bay window and access to alfresco
6 Car shed, carport and workshop with power (18m x 7.5m)
Fully fenced, established driveway and established trees
Access to convenient Bellarine Rail Trail, cycle to Geelong
Currently zoned Rural Living with future opportunity S.T.C.A.

Description:
Attention Developers/ Investors!
Occupying approx. 716m2, this property presents an excellent opportunity for first homebuyers, developers and investors.
Conveniently positioned on a service road, youll appreciate that both public transport and the Ash Road shops are within easy walking distance. Leopold Kindergarten and Leopold Primary School also a short stroll away, meaning that young families can leave the car at home and enjoy the fresh air on the walk to school. The Leopold Community Hub and Library are just moments away, while the Gateway Plaza takes care of all of your shopping and dining needs. The Leopold Memorial Reserve sporting grounds and Gateway Sanctuary entice the whole family to enjoy the outdoors. Developers take note - you have the option to rent the front property and build a townhouse at the back! (STCA)
Inside, the tidy interiors feature polished floorboards. The generous lounge unites with the north-facing porch via a glass sliding door, while the dining room is bathed in natural light. The kitchen features a breakfast bar, oven, gas hob, and rangehood.
Three bedrooms (two with built-in robes) share close access to the updated bathroom, which boasts a shower, deep bathtub, and single vanity. The laundry and separate toilet complete the layout. A gas wall heater, air conditioner, and ceiling fans provide comfort.
Entertainers will be in their element with the sheltered alfresco flowing onto the outdoor entertaining zone. Complete with café blinds, a potbelly wood heater, and fans, this outdoor zone sets the scene for many fun-filled gathering and celebrations throughout the year. The secure pool area is home to an aboveground swimming pool with shade sail - a feature that is sure to win the hearts of young ones!
The long driveway and double carport provide off-street parking for vehicles, caravans, boats, and trailers. With the double lock-up garage currently used as a spacious rumpus room, buyers are granted the option to continue using the space as is or to convert it back into a garage. A garden shed, wood storage area and veggie gardens add the final touch to this terrific home! Inspect ASAP!
Internal area
109m²

Description:
Spacious, Solid & Centre of Town
Nestled in amongst a small number of townhouses is a solid, spacious two-bedroom ground level residence in Drysdale. This property will appeal to downsizers or weekenders seeking a secure, stress-free, low maintenance gem.
Beyond the front security door is an inviting, carpeted living area with a gas wall-heater and ceiling fan. Through the sliding door is the sleeping quarters with two very spacious double bedrooms with built-in robes and a large and central bathroom that accommodates a bath, shower, vanity and toilet.
Flow through to the light filled dining room and generous kitchen complete with a breakfast bar, walk-in pantry, Fisher & Paykel dishwasher and Westinghouse wall oven and four-burner stove top. Sliding doors lead to an undercover patio for barbeques and clothes hanging space.
Other features include a laundry, study nook or sewing bench. remote-controlled one and a half car lock-up garage with work benches and second toilet. This space would suit all handy people and craftspeople.
Only a short walk to the Drysdale village, with grocery stores, medical centres, community centres and beside Drysdales beautiful parklands and lakes.
